items.name: Golden holder sword
items.description: A standard sword given to all who came to this kingdom. May it be faithful to you... AUCH, that's sharp!

items.name: Barrel
items.description: What do I need it for?

items.name: Heal potion
items.description: When you drink it, it heals you for 50% of your HP. Smells like mint.

items.name: Mana potion
items.description: When you drink it, it will gain 50% of your Mana.
